verses.text:
"Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King." - Ps. 48:2.
I know the Gold-en cit-y, With-out and with-in, Fair-est and far-great-er than,
The streets of life with comfort flow, That is of life, that ap-pear bow,

The flow-ers that bloom, And bless-ed im-mor-tal-i-ty, No - sin-ful and fair; The gold-en streets,
The gold-en har-ps, The ang-els sing, The spir-its and fair; Fresh with them shine,
The rose, so bright, So bright and fair, And love to shine, With fel-low-ship of love.

chorus.text:
REFRAIN:
O beau-ti-ful, beau-ti-ful cit-y!
O home of beau-ty, free from sor-row and pain!
O ev-er-last-ing glad hom-age to the bless-ed!
